sentences.en: The chairwoman is up against the greatest challenge to her position.
sentences.cn: 女主席面临她职位的最大挑战。

sentences.en: Primakov was in Japan meeting with the chairwoman of the Socialist Party there.
sentences.cn: 普里马科夫正在日本和那里的社会党女主席会面。

sentences.en: She is the chairwoman of the department of human genetics at the University of Chicago.
sentences.cn: 她是芝加哥大学人类遗传学系的系主任。
